exceptions.exn: The LHS of Derive_n_comp (Derive_n (Derive_n _ _) _ _) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of IHn (Derive_n (fun y : R => a * f y) n x) does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment H0 : forall (f : R -> R) (n m : nat) (x : R), Derive_n (Derive_n f m) n x = Derive_n f (n + m) x f : R -> R n : nat a, x : R IHn : Derive_n (fun y : R => a * f y) n x = a * Derive_n f n x Unable to unify "a * Derive (Derive_n f n) x" with "Derive (Derive_n (fun y : R => a * f y) n) x".

original: induction n. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. rewrite Derive_n_comp. rewrite IHn. reflexivity.
